Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Antonia Giorgia Bianchi on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
Having worked for over 15 years, Antonia Giorgia Bianchi brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Antonia Giorgia Bianchi and Celli tied the knot in 2011. Together they have 1 kid called Chiara.
Education Background:
Antonia obtained her secondary school diploma from Liceo Scientifico Niccol√≤ Copernico Padova in 2006.
Antonia completed her university education at Superior School of Advanced Studies of Pisa in 2011.
She also pursued further higher education at University of Turin, graduating in 2014.
Occupation History:
Antonia Giorgia Bianchi is a 38 year old Investment Director from Italy. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Antonia Giorgia Bianchi launched her career as a Family Office Manager at Intesa Sanpaolo S.p.A., where she gained valuable experience from 2010 to 2015.
At Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena S.p.A., she held the position of Investment Director from 2016 till now, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 80000 EUR.
She has condo located in Parma, worth 1050000 EUR.

She inherited 640000 EUR from her grandfather, a well-known Real Estate Developer, in 2016, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
Client Summary: In summary, Antonia has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
